com.cloudera.oryx.als.common.candidate

Class CandidateFilterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.oryx.als.common.candidate.CandidateFilterFactory

  • public final class CandidateFilterFactory
extends Object

    This class helps choose which CandidateFilter to apply to the recommendation process. If the "model.candidateFilter.customClass" system property is set, then this class will be loaded and used. See notes in CandidateFilter about how the class must be implemented.

    Otherwise, if "model.lsh.sample-ratio" is set to a value less than 1, then LocationSensitiveHashFilter will be used. It is a somewhat special case, a built-in type of filter.

    Otherwise an implementation that does no filtering will be returned.

    Author:
    Sean Owen
